analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CardMarket.bidOnCraftAuction (/unique_chucks/21/0x992d6d699d3f7c627a9be1a5f6020a05ecb86200.sol#377-393):
	External calls:
	- dutchAuctionToCraft.placeBidFromEtherScrolls.value(bidAmount)(cardIdToBidOn) (/unique_chucks/21/0x992d6d699d3f7c627a9be1a5f6020a05ecb86200.sol#389-390)
	- spawnCard(cardIdToCraftWith,cardIdToBidOn) (/unique_chucks/21/0x992d6d699d3f7c627a9be1a5f6020a05ecb86200.sol#392-393)
	External calls sending eth:
	- dutchAuctionToCraft.placeBidFromEtherScrolls.value(bidAmount)(cardIdToBidOn) (/unique_chucks/21/0x992d6d699d3f7c627a9be1a5f6020a05ecb86200.sol#389-390)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allCards (/unique_chucks/21/0x992d6d699d3f7c627a9be1a5f6020a05ecb86200.sol#392-393)
	- indexToOwner (/unique_chucks/21/0x992d6d699d3f7c627a9be1a5f6020a05ecb86200.sol#392-393)

Card (/unique_chucks/21/0x992d6d699d3f7c627a9be1a5f6020a05ecb86200.sol#34-175) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/21/0x992d6d699d3f7c627a9be1a5f6020a05ecb86200.sol#144-150)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/21/0x992d6d699d3f7c627a9be1a5f6020a05ecb86200.sol#150-155)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/21/0x992d6d699d3f7c627a9be1a5f6020a05ecb86200.sol#155-163)

CardMarket.generateRunes (/unique_chucks/21/0x992d6d699d3f7c627a9be1a5f6020a05ecb86200.sol#473-550) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- base1 == base2 || base2 == base3 || base3 == base1
	- base1 == base2 || base2 == base3 || base3 == base1
	- base1 == base2 || base2 == base3 || base3 == base1
	- ability1 == ability2 || ability2 == ability3 || ability3 == ability1
	- ability1 == ability2 || ability2 == ability3 || ability3 == ability1
	- ability1 == ability2 || ability2 == ability3 || ability3 == ability1
